Luke Ho, Money Maverick at Money MaverickLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 06 Apr 2019If you're prepared to lose all your money, yes. I'm actually serious. I'm not insinuating that is what will happen just because you do it. But it could happen.It is fairly likely you will also make a ****ton of money. So invest with whatever you're prepared to lose.0 comments0
